select l.ml_num, i.mb_name, l.id, p.point_num, p.point, p.point_type, p.point_name, p.point_regdate from member_login l, member_info i, point p where l.ml_num = i.ml_num and l.ml_num = p.ml_num and l.ml_num = #{ml_num}
order by p.point_regdate desc limit #{startRow},5

select ifnull(count(*),0) cnt from member_login l, member_info i, point p where l.ml_num = i.ml_num and l.ml_num = p.ml_num and l.ml_num = #{ml_num}
order by p.point_regdate desc

select ( select ifnull(sum(point),0) from point where ml_num = #{ml_num} and point_type = 's' ) + ( select ifnull(sum(point*-1),0) from point where ml_num = #{ml_num} and point_type = 'u' ) total from dual
